overview: When Charlie (Samuel Derrick) and Trish (Phoenix Ever) are asked to deliver a small box to an elusive crime boss, they think itâ€™ll be just another job. However, after being followed and attacked by an unknown assailant, Charlie and Trish begin to realize that there are forces that desperately want the box and will do anything to get it, even if that means killing them.
title: Boogiepop
